main.java.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.controller.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Controller - Accepts input and converts it to commands and action for the model or view.

        ruleListBox - - the combobox which lists all the available rules

      • addButton

      • checkCodeQualityAndShow

        private void checkCodeQualityAndShow()
        Verify the code quality based on the Rules created and sends the results to be displayed in the QualityRulesResultFrame

      • getCodeQualityResults

        private java.lang.String[][] getCodeQualityResults()
        Returns the results of the calculation of each rule, for each method.
        Returns:
        A matrix of strings where each line is a row with the code quality results for a method, and each column is a rule or tool, for which we're presenting results

      • getResult

        private java.lang.String getResult(CodeQualityRule rule,
                                   ExcelRow row)
                            throws javax.script.ScriptException
        Runs a rule over an excelRow and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        rule - - The rule to be to applied to an ExcelRow
        row - - The ExcelRow containing the methodID to have a rule applied to the rule.
        Returns:
        result - The result of applying the rule to the methodID of the given ExcelRow, in string form.
        Throws:
        javax.script.ScriptException - - An exception is thrown if there are invalid rule conditions

      • registerVariables

        public java.lang.String registerVariables(ExcelRow row)
        Creates and returns a string ready to be passed on to a javascript engine, which initializes all the necessary metric variables.
        Parameters:
        row - - The excel row with the values for our metrics.
        Returns:
        String filledRule - The String of metrics turned into variables to use in the JS engine for running the rules.
